item.title: Dots
item.description: Dotfiles Here is a small overview of the most important parts of my dots. Check out the repo for all the configurations. Operating System: NixOS Window Manager: DWM DWM is the (arguably) final stage when going down the hyper-minimal linux road. Previously I have used Hyprland which is an amazing an customizable window manager. If you like the DWM look but want flexible customization and lot’s of plugins, you might want to check out i3.
